00011 using std::pair;
00012 using std::make_pair;
00013 using std::endl;

00017 void AdaptiveProbabilisticBroadcast::initialize(int stage)
00018 {
00019   ProbabilisticBroadcast::initialize(stage);
00020 
00021   if(stage == 1){
00022 
00023       beta = 1.0;
00024 
00025         bvec.setName("Beta Vector");
00026 
00027       timeInNeighboursTable = par("timeInNeighboursTable");
00028   }
00029 }
00030 
00031 void AdaptiveProbabilisticBroadcast::handleLowerMsg(cMessage* msg)
00032 {
00033   ProbabilisticBroadcastPkt* m = check_and_cast<ProbabilisticBroadcastPkt*>(msg);
00034   // Update neighbors table before calling the method of the super class
00035   // because it may delete the message.
00036   updateNeighMap(m);
00037   ProbabilisticBroadcast::handleLowerMsg(msg);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 void AdaptiveProbabilisticBroadcast::updateNeighMap(ProbabilisticBroadcastPkt* m)
00042 {
00043   //find the network address of the node who sent the msg
00044   NeighborMap::key_type nodeAddress = m->getSrcAddr();
00045   //EV << "updateNeighMap(): neighAddress: " << nodeAddress << endl;
00046 
00047   //search for it in the "already-neighbors" map
00048   NeighborMap::iterator it = neighMap.find(nodeAddress);
00049 
00050   //if the node is a "new" neighbor
00051   if (it == neighMap.end()) {
00052     EV << "updateNeighMap(): The message came from a new neighbor! " << endl;
00053 
00054     // insert key value pair <node address, event> in neighborhood map.
00055     cMessage *removeEvent = new cMessage("removeEvent", NEIGHBOR_TIMER);
00056 
00057     // schedule the event to remove the entry after initT seconds
00058     scheduleAt(simTime()+timeInNeighboursTable, removeEvent);
00059 
00060     NeighborMap::value_type pairToInsert = make_pair(nodeAddress, removeEvent);
00061     pair<NeighborMap::iterator, bool> ret = neighMap.insert(pairToInsert);
00062 
00063     // set the context pointer to point to the integer that resembles to the address of
00064     // the node to be removed when the corresponding event occurs
00065     (ret.first)->second->setContextPointer((void*)(&(ret.first)->first));
00066 
00067 
00068   }
00069   //if the node is NOT a "new" neighbor update its timer
00070   else {
00071     EV << "updateNeighMap(): The message came from an already known neighbor! " << endl;
00072         //cancel the event that was scheduled to remove the entry for this neighbor
00073         cancelEvent(it->second);
00074         // Define a new event in order to remove the entry after initT seconds
00075         // Set the context pointer to point to the integer that resembles to the address of
00076         // the node to be removed when the corresponding event occurs
00077     it->second->setContextPointer((void*)(&it->first));
00078 
00079     scheduleAt(simTime()+timeInNeighboursTable, it->second);
00080   }
00081   updateBeta();
00082 }
00083 
00084 void AdaptiveProbabilisticBroadcast::handleSelfMsg(cMessage* msg)
00085 {
00086   if (msg->getKind() == NEIGHBOR_TIMER) {
00087     const NeighborMap::key_type& node = *static_cast<NeighborMap::key_type*>( msg->getContextPointer() );
00088     EV << "handleSelfMsg(): Remove node "<< node <<" from NeighMap!" << endl;
00089     NeighborMap::iterator it = neighMap.find(node);
00090     cancelAndDelete(neighMap.find(it->first)->second);
00091     neighMap.erase(it);
00092     updateBeta();
00093   }
00094   else {
00095     ProbabilisticBroadcast::handleSelfMsg(msg);
00096   }
00097 }
00098 
00099 void AdaptiveProbabilisticBroadcast::updateBeta()
00100 {
00101   int k = neighMap.size();
00102 
00103   // those values are derived from the simulations
00104   // with the non-adaptive protocol.
00105   if (k < 4)
00106     beta = 1.0;
00107   else if (k < 6)
00108     beta = 0.9;
00109   else if (k < 8)
00110     beta = 0.8;
00111   else if (k < 10)
00112     beta = 0.7;
00113   else if (k < 12)
00114     beta = 0.6;
00115   else if (k < 14)
00116     beta = 0.5;
00117   else if (k < 16)
00118     beta = 0.4;
00119   else if (k < 18)
00120     beta = 0.3;
00121   else if (k < 20)
00122     beta = 0.2;
00123   else
00124     beta = 0.1;
00125   if(trace) {
00126       bvec.record(beta);
00127   }
00128 }
